<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Assignments">d86858672f101110da77c886f699b6d4</macroponent><name>repeater_2_repeatWith</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
	// Show positions from api.item.value.min - max
  // api.data...
  return [{
    "position": api.item.value.min == 0 ? "Red" : "Point Alpha"
  },{
    "position": api.item.value.min == 0 ? "Orange" : "Point Bravo"
  }];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-23 05:14:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>c396a2ae2f301110da77c886f699b694</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>repeater_2_repeatWith</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Eyva" source="x_802331_eyva">04928fc32fd41110da77c886f699b615</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Eyva">04928fc32fd41110da77c886f699b615</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c396a2ae2f301110da77c886f699b694</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-23 05:14:03</sys_updated_on><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
